question: Who is the current head of Central Registry of Securitization Asset Reconstruction and Security Interest (CERSAI) ?
explanation: CERSAI is a central online security interest registry of India. It was primarily created to check frauds in lending against equitable mortgages, in which people would take multiple loans on the same asset from different banks. It was founded on march 11,2011 and is headed by Praveen Kumar Sharma.
